userStories.title: Create Task data model and context
userStories.description: Define the TypeScript interface for Task objects and set up React Context for state management. Include fields for id, title, description, priority, and completed status.
acceptanceCriteria: Task interface includes id, title, description, priority, and completed fields
TaskContext provides state and actions for managing tasks
Context is accessible throughout the component tree
TypeScript types are properly exported

userStories.title: Implement task creation form
userStories.description: Create a form component that allows users to input task details (title, description, priority) and add new tasks to the list. Form should validate required fields.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes inputs for title, description, and priority dropdown
Title field is marked as required and validated
New task is added to context state on submit
Form resets after successful submission

userStories.title: Build task list display component
userStories.description: Create a component that displays the list of tasks with their title, description, priority badge, and completion status. Include visual indicators for completed tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Tasks are displayed in a list format
Each task shows title, description, and priority
Completed tasks have visual distinction (e.g., strikethrough)
Empty state message shown when no tasks exist

userStories.title: Add task completion toggle
userStories.description: Implement a checkbox or button that allows users to toggle the completion status of tasks. Update the task's completed field in context state.
acceptanceCriteria: Each task has a clickable toggle control
Clicking toggle updates task completion status
Visual feedback shows the new status immediately
State persists after toggle action

userStories.title: Implement task filtering functionality
userStories.description: Add filter buttons (All, Active, Completed) that filter the displayed tasks based on their completion status. Default view shows all tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Three filter buttons are displayed (All, Active, Completed)
Active filter shows only incomplete tasks
Completed filter shows only completed tasks
Active filter button has visual indication

userStories.title: Add task deletion with confirmation
userStories.description: Implement a delete button for each task that shows a confirmation dialog before removing the task from the list permanently.
acceptanceCriteria: Each task has a visible delete button
Clicking delete shows confirmation dialog
Confirming deletion removes task from context state
Canceling deletion keeps the task in the list

userStories.title: Implement LocalStorage persistence
userStories.description: Add functionality to save tasks to LocalStorage when they change and load them when the app initializes. Ensure data persistence across browser sessions.
acceptanceCriteria: Tasks are saved to LocalStorage on every state change
Tasks are loaded from LocalStorage on app initialization
Data structure is properly serialized/deserialized
App works correctly even if LocalStorage is empty

userStories.title: Apply Tailwind CSS styling
userStories.description: Style all components using Tailwind CSS classes to create a clean, modern interface with proper spacing, colors, and responsive design.
acceptanceCriteria: All components use Tailwind CSS classes
Design is responsive and works on mobile devices
Color scheme is consistent across components
Interactive elements have hover and focus states
